justification: Leadership evidenced by various management roles across multiple companies, including leading sales teams and developing marketing strategies.
Relevant experience is strong with background in business development, sales, and marketing aligned with job description expectations.
No explicit mention of Salesforce proficiency, some indication of market research through roles held but not explicitly.
No explicit proposal writing experience mentioned, strong digital marketing experience from previous roles.

requirements.criteria: Strong analytical and strategic planning skills

input.job_description:
**Title: Business Development Manager**  

**Company: MarketPros Enterprises**  

**Location: Remote with potential travel to client locations**  

**About Us:**  
MarketPros Enterprises is a leading global provider of innovative business solutions with the aim of maximizing brand growth. We work with diverse industries to enhance their sales infrastructure and provide unparalleled customer engagement strategies.  

**Role Overview:**  
As a Business Development Manager at MarketPros Enterprises, you will be responsible for leading strategic initiatives that drive business growth, increase market share, and strengthen client relationships. You will manage cross-functional teams to implement sales strategies, harness market insights, and drive brand expansion.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Develop and implement comprehensive business strategies to enhance revenue growth.  
- Lead a team in executing marketing campaigns and optimizing sales pipelines.  
- Utilize data analytics tools to produce actionable insights improving overall performance.  
- Conduct market research to identify industry trends and new business opportunities.  
- Engage with potential clients via presentations and foster long-term relationships.  
- Manage CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) to streamline operations and enhance productivity.  

**Preferred Skills:**  
- Proficiency in strategic planning and market analysis.  
- Strong leadership skills with proven experience in team development.  
- Advanced knowledge of CRM software and digital marketing tools.  
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills.  

Join us to push the boundaries of business innovation and help us achieve our expansion goals.
input.additional_info: MarketPros Enterprises values diversity in hiring and encourages applications from seasoned business professionals with varied backgrounds. Preferred universities include Ivy League institutions and top business schools. We offer relocation benefits for exceptional candidates and facilitate remote working arrangements. Technical and strategic competencies are assessed through a mix of psychometric evaluations and case study interviews.
minimum_requirements: Strong analytical and strategic planning skills
input.resume:
FAHAD  AMJAD  
 
14 H / A -1, Aitchison Housing Society,  Mobile:  +92 3322293271   
Lahore, Pakistan  Email: fahadali008@gmail.com  
Date  of Birth:  06/06/1986  
 
 
PERSONAL  STATEMENT  
 
An innovative Business Development head  with strong leadership experience and particular expertise in the creation of 
successful business strategies to achieve sales growth. Possesses the proven ability to direct and enhance commercial 
operations skilled in the management and expansion of k ey client relationships, strong communication and negotiation 
skills and focus on sales team to maximize business opportunities.  
 
 
EMPLOYMENT  HISTORY  
 
Business  Development  Head  - Prismatic  Technologies  Pvt Ltd | (Sep 2021  – Sep 2022 ) 
 
Key Responsibilities  
 
• Responsible  for monitoring  the performance  of the sales  team  by establishing  a system  of reports  and 
communications  involving  sales  reports . 
• Lead and manage small to medium projects independently . 
• Work with Business groups to gather and document business needs and processes  
• Advises customers on best practices for CRM processes, user interface and architecture  
• Develops and manages project plans that encompass the complete project life cycle (i.e. project requirements, 
development, qual ity assurance, deployment etc.)  
• Creates the functional and technical specifications documentation for the project . 
• Writes specifications for customizations, data migration, and system integrations . 
• Configure and customize the CRM system based on design spe cifications . 
• Works with the cross -functional areas to secure resources and ensure resources are used effectively . 
• Measures and monitors progress to ensure that a project is delivered on time, within budget, and meets or 
exceeds expectations . 
• Organize  & perform  Outdoor  customer  site visits  (initial  visit,  demonstration,  negotiation,  etc.) 
• Track  all business  development  activities,  analyze  quarterly  progress  and suggest  new strategies  based  on 
findings.  
• Manage  and be responsible  for the sales  and marketing  team,  their performance,  schedules,  and sales  
achievements.  
 
Sales  Executive  - Toss down  Technologies  Pvt Ltd | (Jan 2020 – April 2021 ) 
 
Key Responsibilities  
 
● Tossdown provides E -commerce Solutions which includes (Web, App, Digital Services 
and Ordering  Management  System)  for Restaurants  and Multinational.  
● Researching  organizations  and individuals  online  to identify  new leads  through  Social  
media. Contacting Potential clients via email or phone to establish rapport and setup  
meetings.  
● Contacting  clients  to inform  them  about  new developments  in the company's  products.  
● Developing  quotes  and proposals.  
● Negotiating  and renegotiating  by phone,  email  and in person.   
Media  Manager  / Sales  - Mehboob  Steel  Traders  (Lahore)  | (Jan 2019  – Jan 2020)  
 
Key Responsibilities  
 
● Working as a media manager under the umbrella of MA Group of Companies which have 6 
companies.  
● The company  provides  Import  and Export  services,  Digital  marketing  services,  SEO,  Web  designing,  
custom  software  development,  and ERP solutions.  
● Design their digital marketing strategy which includes (Facebook, YouTube and other platforms to  
create  online  presence)  
● Contacting  Potential  clients  via email  or phone  to establish  rapport  and setup  meetings.  
● Supervise  web designers  to make  their company  profile  and websites.  
● Script  making  for (documentary  and testimonial  videos)  of their clients.  
● Handling  and negotiating  with the Chinese  clients  about  Steel  material,  machinery,  stainless  steel pipes,  
MS pipe,  accessories  and other  queries  given  by clients.  
 
Marketing  Manager  - H&H Marketing Associates (Lahore) | (Sep 2018 – Nov 2018)  
 
Key Responsibilities  
 
● (H&H)  working  as a B2B which  provides  packaging  solutions  for Food  & Beverages,  Pharmaceutical  and 
cosmetic  industries.  
● My role is to provide packaging solutions for industries which includes: (Industrial Machinery, Packaging 
Material & Raw Material, Aluminum Tube, PE Tube, Plastic Laminate Tubes, Pet Bottles, Labels, Tapes 
and some allied products.  
● I also represent the following compani es which are a part of (H&H) Tubex Packaging (Pvt.) Ltd., Alpha  
Containers Industries, PCCL Labels (Pvt.) Ltd. Karachi,  Shanghai Sunway International Trade Co., Ltd.,  
China . 
● The following clients I work with: Seatle Pharma Pakistan (Pvt) Ltd, Shezan Intern ational, Al fazal 
Pharma, Biocos cosmetics, Shama ghee cooking oil etc.  
 
 
 
Digital  Marketing  Executive  - Internet  Media  (Karachi)  | (Sep 2013  – Feb 2015 ) 
 
Key Responsibilities  
 
● Translating  client’s  goals  and objectives  into actionable  and measurable  digital  marketing  programs.  
● Creating  an inbound  and outbound  digital  marketing  strategy.  
● Manage  updates  and strategy  for the brand’s  social  & digital  presence  focusing  on platforms  that 
are relevant  to our client’s  business  objectives  (e.g. Twitter,  Facebook,  Google+,  LinkedIn  etc.) 
●  Managing the social media activities for PTCL: Evo Nitro, PTCL Broadband, 3G Evo 3.1Mbps,  
Evo Wingle, Evo Cloud, MyPtcl, New Landline Offer, Epic New Year Offer, PTCL 3G Offer,  
4Mbps  for all, EVO  Summer  Offer,  CharJI  offer,  1Mbps  Double  offer  and recently  CharJI  Wingle  
and Cloud.  
● Handling  the customer's  query  related  to product  or services  on social  media.  
● Monitoring  social  media  channels  for trends  and opportunities.  
● Viral  marketing  campaigns  on a weekly  basis  for brand  awareness.   
EDUCATION  AND  QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Coventry  University,  United  Kingdom  | Passing  year:  (2012)  
  MA Advertising  & Marketing  
 
  Mohammad Ali Jinnah University, Karachi  | Passing year: (2010)   
  BBA (HONS) Marketing and Finance  
 
SM Govt.  College  Karachi  | Passing  year:  (2006 )  
Intermediate  in Commerce  
 
 Gulistan Shah Abdul Latif School, Karachi  | Passing year: (2004)  
  S.S.C  (computer  science)  
 
 
SKILLS  AND  INTERESTS  
 
• Solution  Selling.  
• Key Account Management.  
• Sales  Forecasting  and Product  Forecasting.  
• Strong Analytical Skills, Creative and Team Player.  
• Pro-efficient  in using  various  business -related  computer  applications.  
• Excellent  spoken  and written  communication  skills.  
• Customer  Service  Management.  
• Identifying  Sales  Opportunities.  
• International  Business  Exposure.  
• Good  organization  and planning  skills.  
• Ability  to work  under  pressure.  
 
 
REFERENCES  
 
References  will be provided  upon  request.

He possesses proven abilities in managing and enhancing commercial operations, particularly in CRM processes and digital marketing, demonstrating a strong commitment to maximizing business opportunities.
